title: Bertrand Eluerd discography
description:
Bertrand Eluerd (1965 - 2005)

Born in Paris in 1965, he studies piano and composition at the Conservatoire de musique in Versailles.

He also composes several soundtracks for video games (Evil Twin: Cyprien's Chronicles.., Jekyll & Hyde) and broadcast material. He dies in Montmoreau in 2005.
